argument.description: Is the name of the table that will be used.
Is the name of the column that will be used.
Is the text pointer to be checked.

description: A text, ntext, or image function that checks whether a specific text pointer is valid.
sample:
USE pubs;  
GO  
SELECT pub_id, 'Valid (if 1) Text data'   
   = TEXTVALID ('pub_info.logo', TEXTPTR(logo))   
FROM pub_info  
ORDER BY pub_id;  
GO
